title: Source.Book.Service.
subtitle: Your Loads with Data
detail: Source your loads, streamline your bookings, and automate check calls all within freightdok. The new way of booking loads backed by data.
howDoWeDoSubtext: Today, truckers spend hours of their day sourcing freight and handling backend operations. Weâ€™ve made it our goal to change that by helping truckers find loads without having to search through hundreds of load boards and automating back office operations.

operations.title: Automate your sourcing
operations.detail: Interact with hundreds of loads sourced from various freight brokers all within freightdok desktop and mobile apps.

operations.title: One-Click Invoices
operations.detail: Build a schedule that keeps your wheels turning. Increase utilization while decreasing deadhead.

operations.title: Business Insights
operations.detail: No more fake, booked, or duplicate loads. freightdok automatically fetches loads that are open to book and bid in real time.

explorePlans.title: Software
explorePlans.detail: Use freightdok to bid, book, service, and streamline back office tasks.

explorePlans.title: Software + Our Team
explorePlans.detail: Operate on your authority and let us handle all your back office tasks and operations.

explorePlans.title: Our Authority
explorePlans.detail: Lease onto our authority and we will help manage your operations, payments, and compliance.
